article_title: The Doctors and Nurses Who Took Selfies After Surgery
article_text:
After medical workers took to snapping and posting online a series of jolly selfies taken in the operating room at a Chinese hospital in the central city of Xi’an, senior hospital executives and a team of medical staff are under fire.

In a case that underlines the dangers of abusing social media at work, the doctors and nurses—clad in green and masked in blue—are seen mugging for the camera while posing next to apparently...

twitter.description: A hospital in China is under fire after medical staff mugged for the camera next to seemingly unconscious patients.
twitter.creator: @YapCW

image.alt: In China, some doctors and nurses took selfies after surgeries
